channel.title: RedTeam on Mohammad Mahdi Anbaraki
channel.description: Recent content in RedTeam on Mohammad Mahdi Anbaraki

item.description:
Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

The emojify function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes.

To enable emoji globally, set enableEmoji to true in your site configuration and then you can type emoji shorthand codes directly in content files.

These begin and end with a colon and include the code of an emoji:

Gone camping! {?:}tent: Be back soon.

That is so funny! {?:}joy:

The rendered output looks like this:

item.title: Lateral Movement via WMI and Threat Hunting Techniques
item.description:
What is the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) Component?

The Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) tool in Windows provides numerous software tools for managing and controlling Windows systems and devices. It allows checking hardware, software, and system status information. WMI communicates through various protocols, enabling applications to receive and manage the required information from the system. Itâ€™s worth mentioning that WMI is based on the DCOM remote protocol.

Windows Management Instrumentation Architecture
